alert.note: Alert for Bureau; La Salle; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 7:49PM CST until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at La Salle affecting Bureau, Putnam and La Salle Counties. For the Illinois River (Upper)...including La Salle...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 200 PM CST. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is expected due to a combination of elevated river levels and river ice. * WHERE...Illinois River from Starved Rock Lock and Dam downstream to confluence with Big Bureau Creek, including the La Salle gauge. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying agricultural area near La Salle and Peru is likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...River levels are expected to remain at near bankfull for the next several days. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
